title: Designated Parking Lots and Parkades
summary: Designates specific parking lots and parkades under city control where parking is regulated.

title: Paid Parking in Municipal Parking Lots
summary: Requires a fee for parking in designated municipal parking lots during specific hours.

title: Metered Parking Rules
summary: Requires vehicles to pay at designated parking meters and adhere to posted time limits.

title: Unauthorized Parking in a Loading Zone
summary: Prohibits non-commercial vehicles from parking in a designated loading zone.

title: Unauthorized Parking in a Taxicab Stand
summary: Prohibits non-taxi vehicles from stopping or parking in designated taxi stands.

title: Illegal Turning Movements
summary: Prohibits turning vehicles in specific restricted directions where signage indicates.

title: U-Turn Prohibition
summary: Prohibits making U-turns at designated locations where signage indicates restrictions.
